act_info.full_title: Hungarian Heritage Month Act, 2022, S.O. 2022, c. 6

content.content:
1 The month of October in each year is proclaimed as Hungarian Heritage Month. 2 Omitted
(provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 3 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
1 The month of October in each year is proclaimed as Hungarian Heritage Month.

2 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).

3 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).

______________
